title: New: Light Wheel – The Keeper
body:
Can’t find any information about Austin’s **Light Wheel**, with seemingly only a Bandcamp page to his name thus far, and his debut track, the SOHN-esque _The Keeper_.

Sampling 1973’s [Lonely Water](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lonely_Water) (or at least I believe it’s that), it’s ambitious, immersive and a fantastic first outing. Check it out below.

Sampling 1973’s Lonely Water (or at least I believe it’s that), it’s ambitious, immersive and a fantastic first outing. Check it out below.
